author: hollowstrawberry
description: Play Chess against your friends or the bot.
install_msg:
♟️ __**Chess**__
Play Chess against your friends or the bot.
Only one game may be active per channel, but it works in threads, and inactive games may be ended by any user.
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load easychess
2. Optionally, enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog easychess
  2.1. Then do [p]slash sync
  2.2. Then restart Discord.
3. Start playing with [p]chess```
short: Play Chess against your friends or the bot.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
